gene.function: FUNCTION: May be implicated in endosomal trafficking, or microtubule dynamics, or both. Participates in cytokinesis (PubMed:20719964). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:20719964}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:19580544}. Midbody {ECO:0000269|PubMed:20719964}. Note=Transiently associated with endosomes (PubMed:19580544). Colocalized with IST1 to the ends of Flemming bodies during cytokinesis (PubMed:20719964). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:19580544, ECO:0000269|PubMed:20719964}.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: negative regulation of BMP signaling pathway [GO:0030514]
negative regulation of collateral sprouting in absence of injury [GO:0048698]
